A-scientific theories and silly theories for adults even but being crammed down on kids.
How do you handle questions of education? How do you think education ought to be handled?

Married to a teacher, which is a great, it's also a great perspective.
I was talking to Glenn Youngkin just last night and I think his race was the sort of national

You said you continue to be surprised. I really do too. It's because evidently they're more

same motivation behind it. Why should the low income minority children in our school's
